LanguageData.AteMeatIngredient.stages.0.label: I ate meat!
LanguageData.AteMeatIngredient.stages.0.description: I feel like I'm gonna puke... my stomach can't digest meat well...
LanguageData.AteHeartwarmFood.stages.0.label: Moon hot pot
LanguageData.AteHeartwarmFood.stages.0.description: This is a really delicious veggie hot pot. The heat warms me to my core.
